item.title: Accelerate Innovation & Maximize Business Value with Serverless Apps [SRV212]
item.description: pluses * streamlined devops, codepipeline * supports a lot of languages * tag direct costs to projects considerations: * know what specialties are * certain languages not supported * need to deal with cold starts, concurrent read/writes, etc. * migration from non-aws requires focus and commitment kinesis firehose to watch for inbound connections faster than humans could do, and then try to shut down (ex. using “i am not a robot”)

item.title: Building SRE from Scratch at Coinbase during Hypergrowth [DEV315]
item.description: Key Insights measure and improve human, organizational and machine systems measure everything always SRE is a move from reactive to proactive event mgmt eliminate toil and eliminate them toil = manual operational work that doesn’t scale Provide organizational back pressure mechanism delay features to clean up tech debt don’t deploy new code until the app is more reliable push back to teams/the org feedback loop How to convert ppl * set early expectations * have to get C-level buy in * takes time
